summary.span: 表示以月為單位的時間間隔並對應至 Oracle 9i 資料型別。

span.span: Represents a time interval in months and corresponds to the Oracle 9i data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Oracle`INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH`資料型別 (Oracle 9i 或更新版本) 包含一段時間的年和月，而且有 5 個位元組的固定的大小。The Oracle `INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH` data type (Oracle 9i or later) contains an interval of time in years and months, and has a fixed size of 5 bytes. 若要取得物件，呼叫方法。To obtain an object, call the method.
